column4: Question:  has Ubuntu made it impossible to INIT3 and close down X-windows?
- not that I am aware of
so how do you close down x windows and just operate from a console?
-- I use that in SuSe - but ubuntu seems happy with sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
-- you can do ctrl+alt+f1 to get to the console
- yes that will do the equiv. of init 5/init 3
INIT 1 worked, now I have one more question
- I don't know the answer to that - sorry
- what kind of video card do you have? what browser ru using?
I dont see how that is relevant?
- it's relevant if it doesn't work in x
can you do cat /proc/cpuinfo and pastebin it?
